entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:36 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 1:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: E 61 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
